history: [system] Are you ready to learn how to make chocolate truffles?
user_utt: [user] Yes! What ingredients do I need?

history: [system] Are you ready to learn how to make chocolate truffles? [user] Yes! What ingredients do I need? [system] You will need either 8 ounces of a chocolate bar (chopped) or chocolate chips, 1/2 cup cream, 1 tablespoon liqueur, and either cocoa powder or nuts to coat the truffles (or both if you prefer!)
user_utt: [user] Great, I have all of those items. What are the steps involved in actually making the chocolate truffles?

history: [system] Are you ready to learn how to make chocolate truffles? [user] Yes! What ingredients do I need? [system] You will need either 8 ounces of a chocolate bar (chopped) or chocolate chips, 1/2 cup cream, 1 tablespoon liqueur, and either cocoa powder or nuts to coat the truffles (or both if you prefer!) [user] Great, I have all of those items. What are the steps involved in actually making the chocolate truffles? [system] Fantastic! Let's begin on the first step: Grab your chopped chocolate or chips and place them in a large ceramic or heatproof/resistant bowl. Place that bowl to the side. Then turn the heat on your stove and place the cream in a small saucepan and heat it on the stove until it reaches a boil. Once the cream is boiling, pour it into your bowl with the chocolate that you placed to the side. Now stir until the cream and chocolate are completely combined.
user_utt: [user] Done. What do I do with the cream and chocolate mixture now? Can I taste test it?
